description_zh: 静态网站和无服务器函数的云平台
description_en: Cloud platform for static sites and Serverless Functions
submitRequirements_zh: 需要详细描述项目需求和使用场景
submitRequirements_en: Detailed description of project requirements and use cases required
rating_zh: 优秀的云平台，专为前端开发者设计，提供了无缝的部署体验。与Next.js集成完美，支持边缘函数，性能优异，是现代Web应用部署的首选平台。
rating_en: Excellent cloud platform designed for frontend developers, providing seamless deployment experience. Perfect integration with Next.js, supports edge functions, excellent performance, the preferred platform for modern web application deployment.
